headline.main: JEWS LISTED FIFTH IN PRO-WAR GROUPS; Gallup Poll Finds Only One in 16 Voters Agrees With the Views of Lindbergh

lead_paragraph: PRINCETON, N.J., Oct. 24 -- Charles A. Lindbergh raised an issue which has provoked wide discussion when he named recently the groups which, in his opinion, are most active in trying to get the country into war. He declared that they were the Roosevelt Administration, the Jews and the British.
abstract: Gallup poll shows 1 in 16 voters agree with anti-Semitic views
